title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 330.2 - Membership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 330.2 - Membership

State Regulations

The Real Estate Advisory Committee shall consist of not less
than seven members. Members shall be appointed by the Comptroller, with the
advice and consent of the Investment Advisory Committee, and shall serve for
his term of office. Any vacancy shall be filled by appointment by the

Comptroller with the advice and consent of the Investment Advisory Committee
for the remainder of the term. No officer of any State department or agency
shall be eligible for membership on the committee. Members shall be entitled to
reimbursement for their actual and necessary expenses, but shall receive no
compensation for their services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2

330.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
